  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205444</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Playing with Technology: Walter Kitundu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spielen mit Technologie: Walter Kitundu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu avec la technologie : Walter Kitundu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogar com tecnologia: Walter Kitundu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giocando con la tecnologia: Walter Kitundu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παιχνίδι με την τεχνολογία: Walter Kitundu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El jugar con tecnología: Walter Kitundu</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">SPARK explores the musical inventions of Walter Kitundu and gets a sneak peek of his show at The Luggage Store Gallery in downtown San Francisco. This Educator Guide is about experimental music, turntablism, and the creation of new instruments inspired by those that are traditional.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">FUNKEN erforscht die musikalischen Erfindungen von
Walter Kitundu und erhält einen Sneak Peek seines Erscheinens an der 
Gepäck-Speicher-Galerie in im Stadtzentrum gelegenem San Francisco. 
Diese Erzieher-Anleitung ist über experimentelle Musik, 
turntablism und die Kreation der neuen Instrumente, die durch die 
angespornt werden, die traditionell sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'ÉTINCELLE explore les inventions musicales de 
Walter Kitundu et atteint un coup d'oeil de mouchard de son exposition
la galerie de mémoire de bagage dans San du centre Francisco. 
Ce guide d'éducateur est au sujet de la musique expérimentale,
du turntablism, et de la création de nouveaux instruments inspirés 
par ceux qui sont traditionnels.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A FAÍSCA explora as invenções musicais de 
Walter Kitundu e começa um peek do sneak de sua mostra na galeria da 
loja da bagagem em San da baixa Francisco. Esta guia do educador
é sobre a música experimental, o turntablism, e a criação dos 
instrumentos novos inspirados por aqueles que são tradicionais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La SCINTILLA esplora le invenzioni musicali di 
Walter Kitundu ed ottiene un peek dello sneak della sua esposizione 
alla galleria del deposito del bagaglio a San Francisco del centro. 
Questa guida dell'educatore è circa musica sperimentale, il 
turntablism e la creazione di nuovi strumenti ispirati da quelli che 
sono tradizionali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ΣΠΙΝΘΗΡΑΣ ερευνά τις μουσικές εφευρέσεις walter 
Kitundu και παίρνει γλιστρά κρυφοκοιτάζει της επίδειξής του 
στη στοά καταστημάτων αποσκευών στο στο κέντρο της πόλης Σαν 
Φρανσίσκο. Αυτός ο οδηγός εκπαιδευτικών είναι για την 
πειραματική μουσική, το turntablism, και τη δημιουργία των νέων
οργάνων που εμπνέεται από εκείνους που είναι παραδοσιακοί.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La CHISPA explora las invenciones musicales de 
Walter Kitundu y consigue una ojeada del chivato de su demostración 
en la galería del almacén del equipaje en San Francisco céntrico. 
Esta guía del educador está sobre música experimental, 
turntablism, y la creación de los instrumentos nuevos inspirados por 
los que sean tradicionales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
